entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • STJ source generator doesn't escape property names #98638
  • Blazor WASM AOT - Error encountered during app startup after AOT compilation #98636
  • STJ Source Generator generates invalid code in some cases #98634
  • MetricsEventSource formats histogram quantiles with CurrentCulture, causing dotnet-counters to misparse them #98632
  • [browser][MT] RangeError: offset is out of bounds #98630
    9.0.0
  • MemsetMemcpyNullref test fails on mono #98628
  • Test failure: MonoTests.System.Runtime.Caching.MemoryCacheTestExpires5.TestCacheExpiryOrdering #98625

Closed

  • +1 for language keywords as well #98639
  • [Native AOT shared library] Request: Statement on support of system linkers #98627
  • [API Proposal]: `X86Base.Rep*` intrinsics #98621

PullRequests

Created

  • #98441 - Ignore invalid handle/access when setting console cp #98641
    area-System.Console
  • [browser][MT] try to fix "Invalid atomic access index" - more #98640
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] pre-load threads early in dotnet.js #98637
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix bug in arm64 LazyMachState unwind #98635
    area-VM-coreclr, 9.0.0
  • New TimeSpan.From overloads which take integers #98633
    new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] silence "keeping the worker alive for asynchronous operation" #98631
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] Bump chrome for testing - linux: 121.0.6167.184, windows: 121.0.6167.185 #98624
    arch-wasm, area-Infrastructure-mono

Merged

  • [browser][MT] JSType.OneWay fire and forget #98567
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Disable optimize ThreadStaticAccess for FreeBSD/arm64 #98629
    area-CodeGen-coreclr, community-contribution
  • JIT: Streaming mode for SPMI #98440
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Include namespace in the reflection error message #98617
    area-System.Reflection

Updated

  • Move memset/memcpy helpers to managed impl #98623
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Revise compiler hardening options on Unix #98622
    area-Infrastructure, community-contribution
  • Importer forward substitution #98380
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Support generic arguments for calli in CoreCLR #97079
    area-Interop-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Unify formatting part of BigInteger of CoreLib #97889
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] deputy #98118
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [browser] Fix debugger support #98494
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 8.0.x
  • [browser] Run tests in parallel #98492
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Implement more ServicePoint properties #97537
    area-System.Net
  • Optimize BigInteger.Divide #96895
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution
  • Optimize BigInteger.Parse #97589
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution

entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • CA1859 analyzer issue #38865

Closed

  • 赶快把还原到.Net6 版本的支持！！！！！！！！你们和他妈傻逼一样，老子用.Net6 写了项目上线正式环境，你们更新把.net6 强制移除了，必须更新.net8.老子他妈的项目，现在出问题了，打不开。换到.net8 打包好了，客户机器上又打不开。 #38285

PullRequests

Merged

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.4xx' => 'release/7.0.1xx' #38822
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

Updated

  • Workload history 3 #36809
    untriaged, Area-Workloads
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/8.0.3xx' => 'main' #38809
    Area-Infrastructure, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/roslyn - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Closed

  • Unused byref dereference is removed despite NRE as a side effect #72165

Updated

  • False positive for CS1503 with MSBuild 17.10, but not dotnet build #72098
  • dotnet 8.0.200 breaking change - wrong exception is thrown when rethrow in a catch inside another catch using async methods #72141
  • Analyzer for dependent static fields of value types. #72164
  • Translation of lines is causing incorrect formatting #71411

PullRequests

Created

  • GetRelative paths accepts paths shorter than the base directory #72166
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged

Updated

  • Improve codegen for concatenation of `string` and `char` (attempt 2) #71793
    Area-Compilers, Community, untriaged
  • Reduce allocations during check for duplicate analyzers #72144
    Area-Compilers, untriaged

entry.title: dotnet/aspnetcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Blazor Web Assembly + Hybrid: HttpClient Upload Progress with ProgressableStreamContent #54105
  • Published size improvement: basicgrpcpublishaot, basicgrpcpublishaot #54104
  • Perf regression: fortunes_dapper, fortunes_ef #54103
  • Perf improvement: mvc #54102
  • Non-fixed CascadingParameters cause out-of-order calls to "SetParametersAsync" #54100
  • Published size improvement: todosapipublishaot, todosapipublishaot #54099

Closed

  • Perf regression: fortunes #54098
  • Perf improvement: json, plaintext, plainTextSansFilter #54092

entry.title: dotnet/maui - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • Custom Shell FlyoutIcon is all white #20682
  • VScode Maui Code build error #20680
  • Styles from Resources are not Cascading to when Style is also set in Xaml file #20679
  • .NET MAUI Stuck on splash screen when reopen the app after start a foreground service #20678
  • Blazor Hybrid - Publish error NETSDK1152 for Microsoft.Web.WebView2 using EF Core 8 #20677
  • nuget还原不了 #20673

Closed

  • Multiple entries for same Color value DimGrey #20675
  • aot-runtime.c:1579, condition `data' not met #20657
  • Error 0x80070005 #20661
  • [BUG] [VS Code] .NET Maui Command Line Tools Not Installed #20674

PullRequests

Created

  • Setup Android App With More Accurate settings #20672

Updated

  • Improvement- alternative geodesic/geolocation distance calculation algorithms #20663
  • Picker ItemsSource fixes #19728
    area/controls 🎮, community ✨, stale
  • Fix Action Sheets for macOS #19629
    platform/macOS 🍏, area/controls 🎮, control-dialogalert, stale
  • Fix Windows device tests #20401
  • Propagate the app theme to all children #19931
    area/Xaml </>, area/perf 🏎️
  • [housekeeping] Automated PR to fix formatting errors #19848
    t/housekeeping ♻︎, area/infrastructure 🏗️

entry.title: dotnet/efcore - Issues & Pull Requests - 2024-02-18
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • System.InvalidOperationException: Only root entity type should be marked as temporal. Entity type: #33119
  • Consolidate Migrations #33118
  • EF reduce usage of memory #33117
  • Add IncludeAll Method with Recursion Level for IQueryable #33116

Closed

  • ArgumentException thrown when building queries involving owned entities mapped with .ToJson() #33046
    9.0.0

PullRequests

Merged

  • Fix to #33046 - ArgumentException thrown when building queries involving owned entities mapped with .ToJson() #33110

Updated

  • [release/8.0] Fix to #32972 - The database default created by Migrations for primitive collections mapped to JSON is invalid #33048
    Servicing-approved, 8.0.4
